column4: i cant play flash/Java games like those on facebook. i go to the page and they dont load i am faced with a blank screen.
i have installed that i did it as i found a link to RestrictedFormats and that had tools to install so i did but still nothing
the three main ones are sun-java6-bin, sun-java6-jre and sun-java6-plugin, do you have all 3?
